overall_design: Single-cell RNA-seq was performed on Cre-dependent AAV-GFP+ cells that were manually isolated from dissociated Arc-ME of two adult male RIP-Cre mice

title: A Molecular Census of Arcuate Hypothalamus and Median Eminence Cell Types
